org.primaresearch.web.gwt.server

Class DocumentPageSyncServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • RemoteServiceServlet
      • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.server.DocumentPageSyncServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentPageSyncService

    public class DocumentPageSyncServiceImpl
extends RemoteServiceServlet
implements DocumentPageSyncService
    Synchronisation of page content between client and server.
    Author:
    clc

      • addContentObject

        public ContentObjectSync addContentObject(java.lang.String url,
                                 ContentObjectC object)
                                   throws RemoteException
        Adds a new content object on server side. The object type is specified by the given template object. The template object is enriched with ID and attributes of the new object and is returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        addContentObject in interface DocumentPageSyncService
        Parameters:
        url - Source of PAGE XML file (optional)
        object - Page content object (e.g. a text line)
        Returns:
        A sync object with old ID and new content object. The content object may be null if no object could be created.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
